content: happy holidays knitters your present is a little early since there is some assembly required knit up a mitten garland to count down the days to christmas at 4 5 inches from fingertip to cuff each mitten is just the right size to hold a small treat for each of the first 24 days of december if you don t need an advent calendar the mittens are great on their own as ornaments cute as money holders would look sweet on a wreath and darling atop a gift you can also use use your garland mittens to spell a holiday greeting or knit them for kittens i m just kidding about that last one they don t fit kittens this was originally published as a knit picks pattern and is now available as a ravelry download the ballerina bendy doll was made by princess nimble thimble it s really too cute to be believed http //www etsy com/shop/dannielle
